parameters: I'm a traveling merchant. Would you like to buy something?

Sigh... Ever since it became known that there's no treasure
in this dungeon, the number of adventurers has really
dwindled. It's quite troubling...
It seems like you're having some trouble.
Since we're here, why don't we invite them to the village?

I had no idea such a village existed...!! This is a business
opportunity! Thank you for telling me!
A traveling merchant has joined your party!
There's something written here in faded letters...

What's this, the Demon Lord's grave? I wonder if there
really was such a thing as a Demon Lord...
I have heard tales of a king of demons existing long ago.

Apparently, he did something really terrible and was
defeated and sealed away by a hero...

Wow, is that so. With a grave that looks so ominous, it's
kind of scary to think he might come back to life someday.

Well, even if it's the Demon Lord, he wouldn't be able to
beat me! Hero Memerisu, born to explode! Just kidding♪

That's right, if it's Memerisu-chan, I'm sure even the Demon
Lord could be defeated.

But this has nothing to do with our current adventure, so
let's move on!
Ugh! What's with this flower, it stinks!!!
It's... it's like my nose is going to bend...!!
Ugh! What's with this flower, it stinks!!!
My, my nose feels like it's going to bend...!!
